name: ArcGIS Component Configuration File
summary: An ECFG file is a configuration file used by ArcGIS, a mapping program used to create, share, and manage geographic maps, data, and analytical models. It contains category information for a custom component used by ArcGIS. ECFG files are read by ArcGIS at runtime to load related components created by third-party developers.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
